thread.section_title: Songfinch Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Songfinch | songfinch.com
thread.title: David Tappert

author: David Tappert
title: David Tappert
text:
... But Rob walked me through it. Even added more info at last minute and was worried the piece wouldn't be what she would like, Rob walked me through that too.
All said and done, I'm sure I wasn't an easy customer but the team pulled it off.
She LOVED the song ... I have already recommended Songfinch to many.
Thanks to the team for brining my thoughts together, I will be a returning customer.
David,
Post, Oregon
